reference.title: Reloading Certificates
reference.shortdesc: Takes chain.pem and pkey.pem and applies to a node.

refbody.section:
POST /node/controller/reloadCertificate
DescriptionThis command grabs chain.pem and pkey.pem from the data folder/inbox/ directory and applies them to the node.
Parameters
chain.pem - Contains a chain of pem-encoded certificates starting from the node certificate and ending with the last intermediate certificate that precedes the cluster certificate.
pkey.pem - Contains the pem-encoded private key for the node certificate.
Examplecurl -X POST http://user:password@127.0.0.1:9000/node/controller/reloadCertificate
Returns
200 - If it is a success
400 - An error message if it failed.
